extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITE    A Grade of C+ in 6.0 units from HIST 300-329 and registration in a HIST Major or Medial Plan.

basic.description: Examines the social and cultural transformation of Latin America from 1850 to 1950. Themes include nation-building, urbanization, emergence of new social classes, changing role of women, debates about immigration, crime, public health, and the 'social question', and the persistence of fundamental problems of poverty and inequality.
basic.subject: HIST
basic.title: Modernization & Cultural Change in Latin America, 19th & 20th Centuries
